title: Cajun-style chicken pasta
ingredients: ['100g linguine pasta', '2 skinless chicken breast fillets, sliced into thin strips', '2 teaspoons Cajun seasoning', '2 tablespoons butter', '1 red pepper, sliced', '1 green pepper, sliced', '4 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '1 spring onion, chopped', '225ml double cream', '1/4 teaspoon dried basil', '1/4 teaspoon lemon and black pepper seasoning', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '1/4 teaspoon garlic powder', '1/4 teaspoon black pepper', '4 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese']
